text: Hey {NAME}, long time no see! Coffee soon?
Thinking of you {NAME}, hope you're having a great week!
Happy Birthday {NAME}! Hope you have an amazing day!
Wishing you the best on your special day {NAME}!
Hello {NAME}, I hope this message finds you well.
Hi {NAME}, it's been a while. Would love to catch up professionally soon.
Salaam, Jummah Mubarak! Hope you have a blessed Friday.
Salaam {NAME}, keeping you in my duas. Hope all is well.
